mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM report_data WHERE unit_id=#{unitId} and (DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')) ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT 1;
SELECT count(1) FROM report_data WHERE type =#{type} and (DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')) ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT 1;
